name: Zane
text: When my son was three years old me and his mother (my ex-wife) had become quite worried that he would never talk as he had yet to mumble a single syllable. He tried everything we read about and that our child psychologist recommended, but …More

name: Bill Sweitzer
text: Great food and service!  We went in late during their lunch buffet and they were very busy.  They seated us quickly, got our drinks and kept the table clear with no problems.  They kept up with demand and very rarely did you have to wait for fresh pizza.

name: Tim Reed
text: The food was to chain standards.   The place was slammed for a lunch buffet and the employees were still friendly and welcoming.  The buffet had a variety of pizzas made so a person could try some of everything.   Will go again.  The salad bar fresh.

name: Debi Barlow
text: I've called in orders for pick up twice lately.  Friendly on the phone. Both orders great. South Kirksville MO

name: Jeremy B
text: Great pizza!

name: Marie Haines
text:
It's been awhile since we visited a Pizza Hut
Very pleased.   Will visit again

name: Aaron Huisinga
text: Always get great service here. Excellent wait staff!!!

name: Phoenix Kazmerik
text: This is a great family restaurant. Service is good, foods hot, and the dining rooms clean. Give them a try.

name: Steve Pinnell
text: Very busy, dine in and delivery.  Good service and great food. Had a thin crust supreme pizza and order of bone in wings in medium buffalo sauce. I highly recommend this restaurant.

name: Harold Love
text: The employees and service is great the pizzas are ok

name: Benjamin Hockett
text: The server was great fun, but the food was absolutely terrible. The salad bar was sad, the pizza was dehydrated, and the breadsticks were swimming in oil.

name: William Daniels
text: Amazing food and good customer service

name: Tyler Millhouse
text: Pretty good pizza they definitely do a good job and are descent on delivery time and service

name: Shelly Salsberry
text: Amy is amazing we always request her pizza was great and service was fast

name: Rowen Conry
text: This Pizza Hut has character. Oftentimes I find myself here when the restaurant is empty, and there is a certain vibe I feel that I never get anywhere else in Kirksville. The servers are helpful and friendly, and the food is average -- but eating here is always a delight!

name: Reda Baughman
text: everyone loves Pizza Hut it's just a good place to eat salad bar is one wonderful and a fresh hot pizza right out of the oven oh yummy my son loves her hot wings bone out. Great customer service would recommend too and everyone:-)

name: Jeri Rider
text: The service was exceptional.  Our waiter understood so readily that we didn't want our pizza while we were still enjoying our appetizers. Perfect place to visit.

name: Alex Partin
text: Excellent service and greAt pizza...thank you

name: Brian West
text: I hade a carry out order of 4 pizza's & 2 family orders of bread stix. I usaully dont say negative things but i think i should this time. The pizza's were horrible, the bq beef was down right gross usually it is good. The chicken buffalo …More

name: Amanda Yanna
text: The pizza they made for me was out of this world it was a pleasure going there

name: Alex Shields
text: This was a lunch visit during their buffet hour.  The food  was good as it always is at this location, this restraunt is clean when we visit and the service is good also. I would give them a 5 star but the 2 Kirksville MO Pizza Hut …More

name: Kendrea Smith
text: Love there lunch buffet!

name: Suzann Yelton
text: Very good.  North one delivers.

name: Chase Smith
text: We love Pizza Hut and their pretzel crust pizza. It was 80 cent wing night and we had several flavors along with some pie. I think they're wings are decent. I wouldn't recommend the new Jim Beam Bourbon wings. They were very strong. It was …More

name: Elpiniki Smith
text: We love the lunch buffett. Everyone has their variety favorites,  and i get my salad and pasta fix.  The whole family loves the CinnaStix! Service varies but is usually good.

name: Dennis Mary Lou Kraus
text: Very good lunch and the waitress was wonderful.

name: Vicky Currier
text: Love pan pizza and the carry out price for 2 topping is only $7.99 when you order online.

name: Doris Ellis
text: South pizza hut is the best.

name: James Bass

text: Good food but way over priced. Competition destroying Pizza Hut these days on prices! The quit selling beer!
